Pre-Game Insights: The Indiana Pacers play host to the Milwaukee Bucks at the Gainbridge Fieldhouse on Tuesday night.
The Milwaukee Bucks have cooled off a bit recently as they've lost three of their past five games.
The Indiana Pacers have been in pretty good form lately as they've won six of their last eight games.
Others: The betting odds for the game are Indiana Pacers -1 and the Over/Under is 228.5.
The article mentions that Giannis Antetokounmpo and Obi Toppin are questionable for the game.
